summary.para: In-memory object representation of an INI file.
This class is a read-only collection of objects.

member.summary: Initializes a new empty instance of the class with the default settings.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified file.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified file.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.Load(System.String,IniFile.IniLoadSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified string.
member.param: The string representing the Ini content.

member.name: P:IniFile.Ini.AllItems
member.summary: Collection of all items in the Ini.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.Add``1(``0,IniFile.Items.ITopLevelIniItem)

summary.para: Adds a section, comment or blank line to the Ini object.
Adds at the end of the collection, unless the beforeItem parameter is specified, in which case the new item is inserted before the beforeItem item.

member.typeparam: The type of the new item being added.
member.param: The existing item in the Ini file before which the new item should be inserted.
